pb001ErisaTextDataRow.mErisaText: Par Providers: Please see your contract Non-participating Providers: If you disagree with the amount of the payment or denial for the service(s) you rendered, you have the right to request a reconsideration or "appeal". You must file your appeal within 60 days of the date on the remittance notification. To file an appeal, send a written appeal to BCBSRI, Attention Grievances and Appeals, 500 Exchange Street, Providence, RI 02903. Please supply additional written documentation with your appeal to include comments, clinical records, orother documentation that supports your appeal. We will review our initial decisions and notify you in writing of the outcome of your appeal. We will respond to administrative appeals within 60 calendar days and medical necessity appeals within 15 business days of receipt. Please note if you choose to appeal you must also submit a signed Waiver of Liability, which hold our member harmless regardless of the appeal outcome. Form can be found at https://www.bcbsri.com/providers/uploads/Model_Waiver_of_Liability
